item.title: jade add a quote by Edward Lear
item.description: "And hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, They danced by the light of the moon." -- Edward Lear

item.title: jade add a quote by Judy Blume
item.description: "My only advice is to stay aware, listen carefully, and yell for help if you need it." -- Judy Blume

item.title: jade add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "What's the good of living if you don't try a few things?" -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: jade add a quote by Richard Ford
item.description: "Some people want to be bank presidents. Other people want to rob banks." -- Richard Ford

item.title: jade add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "Books have a unique way of stopping time in a particular moment and saying: Let’s not forget this." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: jade add a quote by Nikos Kazantzakis
item.description: "I felt once more how simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. Nothing else." -- Nikos Kazantzakis

item.title: jade add a quote by Richard Wright
item.description: "Whenever my environment had failed to support or nourish me, I had clutched at books..." -- Richard Wright

item.title: jade add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "You've got to get obsessed and stay obsessed." -- John Irving

item.title: jade add a quote by Ludovic Halévy
item.description: "Love is a rebellious bird, that nobody can tame, and you call him quite in vain, if it suits him not to come." -- Ludovic Halévy

item.title: jade add a quote by Vita Sackville-West
item.description: "Damn you, spoilt creature; I shan’t make you love me any the more by giving myself away like this." -- Vita Sackville-West

item.title: jade add a quote by Leslie Marmon Silko
item.description: "You don't have anything if you don't have the stories." -- Leslie Marmon Silko

item.title: jade add a quote by Edward Albee
item.description: "You're alive only once, as far as we know, and what could be worse than getting to the end of your life and realizing you hadn't lived it?" -- Edward Albee

item.title: jade add a quote by Horton Foote
item.description: "I’ve known people that the world has thrown everything at to discourage them...to break their spirit. And yet something about them retains a dignity. They face life and don’t ask quarters." -- Horton Foote

item.title: jade add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "The future is there... looking back at us. Trying to make sense of the fiction we will have become." -- William Gibson

item.title: jade add a quote by Ved Mehta
item.description: "Surely only boring people went in for conversations consisting of questions and answers. The art of true conversation consisted in the play of minds." -- Ved Mehta

item.title: jade add a quote by Billy Collins
item.description: "You will always be the bread and the knife, not to mention the crystal goblet and—somehow—the wine." -- Billy Collins

item.title: jade add a quote by Louis Adamic
item.description: "My grandfather always said that living is like licking honey off a thorn." -- Louis Adamic

item.title: jade add a quote by Bohumil Hrabal
item.description: "I pop a beautiful sentence into my mouth and suck it like a fruit drop." -- Bohumil Hrabal

item.title: jade add a quote by Edmond Rostand
item.description: "A great nose may be an index Of a great soul" -- Edmond Rostand

item.title: jade add a quote by Francesco Petrarca
item.description: "Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together." -- Francesco Petrarca

item.title: jade add a quote by Noah Webster
item.description: "The heart should be cultivated with more assiduity than the head." -- Noah Webster

item.title: jade add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "I'm glad you like adverbs — I adore them; they are the only qualifications I really much respect." -- Henry James

item.title: jade add a quote by Charles Chaplin
item.description: "Life is a beautiful magnificent thing, even to a jellyfish." -- Charles Chaplin

item.title: jade add a quote by George Gordon Byron
item.description: "And thus the heart will break, yet brokenly live on." -- George Gordon Byron

item.title: jade add a quote by Elaine May
item.description: "You know how sometimes you lie in bed at night and think, “What if the law of gravity just wears out and lets go and I drift into space?” Does that ever make you anxious?" -- Elaine May

item.title: jade add a quote by Paula Fox
item.description: "The minute you become conscious that you are doing good, that's the minute you have to stop because from then on it's wrong." -- Paula Fox

item.title: jade add a quote by Halldór Laxness
item.description: "For man is essentially alone, and one should pity him and love him and grieve with him." -- Halldór Laxness

item.title: jade add a quote by Sue Grafton
item.description: "Ghosts don't haunt us. That's not how it works. They're present among us because we won't let go of them." -- Sue Grafton

item.title: jade add a quote by Anita Loos
item.description: "I've always loved high style in low company." -- Anita Loos

item.title: jade add a quote by John Boyne
item.description: "Regrets and apologies are all very well, but there's things that happen in a person's life that are so scorched in the memory and burned into the heart that there's no forgetting them. They're like brands." -- John Boyne
